title: Kim Hyun-joong meets fans in Japan
text: Kim Hyun-joong ‘Law of the Jungle’ sequel to show New York’s gritty side SuJu subunit successful in Japan T-ara’s Park releases solo mini-album Supermodel Zhang Liang makes cameo appearance in ‘Doctor Stranger’ Lee Chang-min, Melody Day release emotional single To write comments, please log in to one of the accounts.
